oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discussion - California Angels: Women of West Coast Country - 2012-12-15
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Panel discussion with the women of West Coast Country Music from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on December 15, 2012. Companion to a Bakersfield Sound exhibit.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Scott Bomar; Kay Adams; Lorrie Collins; Rosie Flores; Rose Lee Maphis; Jean Shepard;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Moderated by Scott Bomar. Panel participants are Kay Adams, Lorrie Collins; Rosie Flores; Rose Lee Maphis; Jean Shepard. Includes selected audio excerpts
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Bomar, Scott B. ; Shepard, Jean, 1933- ;Maphis, Rose Lee; Collins, Lorrie; Flores, Rosie; Adams, Key; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
